class.name: PlaneMesh
class.description: Class representing a planar [PrimitiveMesh]. This flat mesh does not have a thickness. By default, this mesh is aligned on the X and Z axes; this default rotation isn't suited for use with billboarded materials. For billboarded materials, use [QuadMesh] instead.

members.member: Number of subdivision along the Z axis.
Number of subdivision along the X axis.
